dublin_core.dcvalue: Research is ongoing looking for new health care processes regeneration and rationalisation Instrument and tool technology has come to health care while patient documents have become electronic The process has to make sure that patient records are of a high quality and all information readily available if it is to improve patient care
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-06T16:45:45Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2009-07-13
Studies in health technology and informatics
Using electronic patient record with PDA, benefits and nursing staffs' know-how to use technology.
